text: Grini concentration camp (;Joachim Grøgaar. Tre år under Kunze ["three years under Kunze"]. (1945) Publisher: Aschehoug (in Oslo, Norway) ) was Norway's largest concentration camphttp://auschwitzstudygroup.com/the-forgotten- camps/469-grinihttps://core.ac.uk/download/pdf/29842580.pdf during the occupation of Norway during World War II. ==Related pages== *Occupation government's prison camps in Norway during World War Two ==References== Category:World War II prisoner of war camps in Norway Category:Nazi concentration camps in Norway
title: Grini detention camp
